# GDS (Global Design System) - MCP Documentation

> Multi-audience documentation for the Global Design System, optimized for LLM retrieval.

---

## FAQ - Common Questions

### What button variants are available in GDS?

GDS provides **6 button variants**:

1. **Primary** - Main call-to-action, filled Neptune blue (#024DDF)
2. **Secondary** - Alternative actions, outline style with Neptune border
3. **Tertiary** - Low-emphasis actions, text-only with hover background
4. **Ghost** - Minimal style, transparent with subtle hover
5. **Transaction** - For purchase/payment actions, uses Earth green (#01A469)
6. **Inverse** - For dark backgrounds, white text/border

**Button sizes:** Small, Medium (default), Large

**Tailwind for Primary Button:**
```html
<button class="inline-flex items-center justify-center gap-2 px-4 py-2.5 bg-[#024DDF] text-white font-semibold rounded-lg hover:bg-[#0141B8] focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 disabled:bg-[#D6D6D6] disabled:cursor-not-allowed">
  Button Label
</button>
```

### What are the GDS colors?

| Token | Hex | Usage |
|-------|-----|-------|
| Neptune | #024DDF | Primary actions, links |
| Neptune Hover | #0141B8 | Hover state for primary |
| Cosmos | #121212 | Dark text, dark backgrounds |
| Earth | #01A469 | Success, confirmations |
| Mars | #EB0000 | Errors, destructive actions |
| Granite | #646464 | Secondary text |
| Slate | #949494 | Disabled, placeholder |
| Lunar | #D6D6D6 | Borders, dividers |
| Spotlight | #FFFFFF | White backgrounds |

### What is the GDS spacing scale?

| Token | Value | Tailwind | Use Case |
|-------|-------|----------|----------|
| lounge | 4px | p-1 | Tight spacing, icons |
| club | 8px | p-2 | Default gap |
| hall | 12px | p-3 | Small padding |
| auditorium | 16px | p-4 | Standard padding |
| theatre | 20px | p-5 | Medium spacing |
| amphitheatre | 24px | p-6 | Section gaps |
| arena | 32px | p-8 | Large spacing |
| stadium | 48px | p-12 | Section padding |
| dome | 64px | p-16 | Page sections |
| field | 88px | p-22 | Hero sections |

### What components are in GDS?

**52 components** organized by category:

**Buttons:** Button, CircleButton, SquareButton, PillButton, PaginationButton

**Form Inputs:** InputField, TextInput, TextArea, PasswordInput, Checkbox, RadioButton, Toggle, ToggleSwitch, SelectInput, DoubleRangeInput, DateOfBirth, CountryPicker, PhoneNumber

**Feedback:** AlertBox, Toast, Tooltip, ErrorMessage, SuccessMessage, LoadingSpinner, Skeleton

**Layout:** Card, Modal, SidePanel, Accordion, Header, Footer

**Typography:** DisplayHeading, SectionHeading, TitleHeading, TextStyle, Link

**Specialized:** Badge, Stepper, Countdown, CountdownTimer, TicketCardv2, SeatInfo, ShareCard, BrandLogo

## Quick Copy-Paste Code

### Primary Button
```html
<button class="inline-flex items-center justify-center gap-2 px-4 py-2.5 bg-[#024DDF] text-white font-semibold rounded-lg hover:bg-[#0141B8] focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#024DDF] focus:ring-offset-2 transition-colors">
  Button
</button>
```

### Secondary Button
```html
<button class="inline-flex items-center justify-center gap-2 px-4 py-2.5 border-2 border-[#024DDF] text-[#024DDF] font-semibold rounded-lg hover:bg-[#024DDF] hover:text-white transition-colors">
  Secondary
</button>
```

### Input Field
```html
<input type="text" class="w-full px-4 py-3 border border-[#D6D6D6] rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#024DDF] focus:border-transparent placeholder:text-[#949494]" placeholder="Enter text..." />
```

### Card
```html
<div class="p-6 bg-white rounded-xl shadow-md border border-[#D6D6D6]">
  <h3 class="text-lg font-semibold text-[#121212]">Title</h3>
  <p class="mt-2 text-[#646464]">Content</p>
</div>
```

### Badge
```html
<span class="inline-flex items-center px-2 py-1 text-xs font-medium rounded-full bg-[#024DDF] text-white">Badge</span>
```

### Alert (Success)
```html
<div class="flex items-center gap-3 p-4 rounded-lg bg-[#01A469]/10 text-[#01A469]">
  <span>✓</span><p>Success message</p>
</div>
```

### Alert (Error)
```html
<div class="flex items-center gap-3 p-4 rounded-lg bg-[#EB0000]/10 text-[#EB0000]">
  <span>⚠</span><p>Error message</p>
</div>
```

### Modal
```html
<div class="fixed inset-0 z-50 flex items-center justify-center bg-black/50">
  <div class="w-full max-w-md p-6 bg-white rounded-xl shadow-xl">
    <h2 class="text-xl font-semibold">Title</h2>
    <p class="mt-4 text-[#646464]">Content</p>
    <div class="flex justify-end gap-3 mt-6">
      <button class="px-4 py-2 text-[#646464]">Cancel</button>
      <button class="px-4 py-2 bg-[#024DDF] text-white rounded-lg">Confirm</button>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
```
